item.title: iOS Network Debugging With Charles Proxy
item.author: aanayini@gmail.com (Arjun Nayini)
item.description: I was recently working on a project where I encountered a bit of slow down in debugging some API calls. The project can be simplified as grabbing data from a new API, parsing and persisting the data, and rendering it in a UITableView. In this particular case, the development of the backend API was being done by a separate set of people and was using a new backend infrastructure separate from the old API infrastructure.
